title: Bonus Episode - Sadhguru Shares Secrets to Happiness
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Sadhguru sits down with Ebro in the Morning to drop MAJOR gems on happiness, business, the new generation, social media, and even shares some Guru Talk with the team! He also sheds light on his Save Soil campaign which addresses the soil crisis by bringing together people from around the world to stand up for Soil Health, and supporting leaders of all nations to institute national policies and actions toward increasing the organic content in cultivable Soil.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
Sadhguru sits down with Ebro in the Morning to drop MAJOR gems on happiness, business, the new generation, social media, and even shares some Guru Talk with the team! He also sheds light on his Save Soil campaign which addresses the soil crisis by bringing together people from around the world to stand up for Soil Health, and supporting leaders of all nations to institute national policies and actions toward increasing the organic content in cultivable Soil.
